Room.Name: Forest Trail
Room.ShortDescription: You are on a forest trail with a red haze drifting overhead. The grass is greener than the Enchanted Forest and the trees are florishing.
Room.LongDescription: A voice speaks out to you: "You have chosen the path of danger, as would any worthy adventurer. Careful, as you will find the Adamantine Dragon's cave to the west. A smart adventurer does not fight when he or she does not have to." The voice ends on a single musical note. The trail seems to travel in a full circle. You can walk to the northeast and southeast from here. The dense forest and a mysterious force shield prevent you from leaving the path's circle.
